text: "I Want You" is a song by Marvin Gaye. It was released in 1976. It was covered in 1995 by trip-hop band Massive Attack and Madonna. ==Charts== Charts (1976) Peak position ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Massive Attack songs Category:Madonna songs Category:Marvin Gaye songs Category:Diana Ross songs Category:Robert Palmer songs
title: I Want You (Marvin Gaye song)
